programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions>
</CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
instr 1
a1 diskin "fox.wav",1,0,1 k1 randh 80, 2.5 a2 vco2 8, 220+k1 fsig pvsanal a1,1024,256,1024,1 fsig2 pvsanal a2,1024,256,1024,1 keps[] pvsceps fsig,30 kenv[] cepsinv keps fenv tab2pvs r2c(kenv) fvoc pvsfilter fsig2, fenv, 1 asig pvsynth fvoc
out asig endin
